text: Sarah Brightman (born 14 August 1960) is an English classical crossover soprano, actress, songwriter and dancer. She is the best-selling soprano of all times. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Symphony (2002) * A Winter Symphony (2005) * Dreamchaser (2011) ==Other websites== * * * *Fairwood Music (UK) Ltd. title: Sarah Brightman
